# Spotify introduces free streaming option in South Korea 


Everybody has known Spotify since 2011, the year of Spotify coming into Belgium. You know more if you are a student, because thanks to your student status, a premium account is cheaper than if you were not! 

![image](data:image/png;base64,)

To explain for beginners, Spotify proposes free music and podcasts service.

But in some country like South Korea, Spotify still young! South Koreans have had access to Spotify since 2021. To have access to this novelty, Koreans must have paid, but from now, they will have access to free account.

The company sais that this change will enable them to response better the global audience with Korean music.

Spotify sais: *"Brands who advertise on Spotify's free tier can deliver their message effectively as Spotify ads capture twice as much attention than social media platforms globally"* also :*"this opens an exciting new avenue for advertisers and brands in South Korea looking to reach a predominantly young, highly engaged audience"*

Price: 
- Basic account: the cost will be 7,900W which is more or less than 5.35Eur.
- Duo account: 16,350W is more or less 11,07Eur
- Individual: 10,900W is more or less 7,38Eur

Since their lunch in this Asian country, the platform streams is over 5.8 billion, which is over 70% growth since their launch.

[Spotify starts free streaming option in South Korea](https://www.reuters.com/technology/spotify-starts-free-streaming-option-south-korea-2024-10-09/)

[Spotify launches Free tier in South Korea](https://www.musicbusinessworldwide.com/spotify-launches-free-tier-in-south-korea12/)
